A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went in to the theater to watch this movie from an objective standpoint and with an open mind. Neglecting that I am a huge fan of Star Wars\, I truly tried to view this movie as a cinematic experience separate from what I was familiar with. And even with all of that\, this movie was absolute garbage. I made a profile on rotten tomatoes because I hated this movie so much I felt I needed to write a lengthy review about this dumpster fire. Anyone who enjoyed this movie has no cinematic taste nor a love for Star Wars. I hated this movie more thank I hated Jar Jar Binks.
